name: Clojuresprites
body:
# ClojureSprites

A Clojure application to automatically create and implement a sprite from a CSS file.

## Usage

./bin/clojuresprite --incss=/input/css/file.css --outsprite=/output/img/sprite.png [--outcss=/output/css/file.css] [--tempdir=/tmp/whatever]

## License

Copyright (C) 2012 Mike Flynn

Distributed under the Eclipse Public License, the same as Clojure.
tagline: A Clojure application to automatically create and implement a sprite from a CSS file.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
